title: Is Eu boards down for everyone or just me?

replies.body: Looks like boards were down for a bit, but everything should be fine now!

Hello OP Champions,

The eu forum is not available for everyone.

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_GB#euw
http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_PL#eune

cordially,
Cobra02
